message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $9,500. I believe this is a fair offer considering its value to you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. How about $8,500? That's still a good deal for you, as it's significantly more than your own valuation.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? This price reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, I'm still not quite there yet. I'm willing to go up to $8,750.  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and allows us both to reach an agreement.
